fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, External Relations, Public Health, Borders and Security
head_office_address: Campus de la Plaine ULB-CP 237 Avenue Arnaud Fraiteur
eu_initiatives:
- freedom of religion and belief, which includes the right not to believe and the right to change one's belief 
- freedom of thought and speech, which implies opposition to laws prohibiting “blasphemy”; 
- non-discrimination on all grounds (ethnic or national origin, religion and belief, disability, age, gender, sexual orientation, etc.), 
- women’s sexual and reproductive health and rights when and where they are threatened.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: We are informally but closely linked to the International Humanist and Ethical Union (IHEU - www.iheu.org)
relevant_communication: EHF actively communicates on the political initiatives it follows and on the values it is promoting through a newsletter, meetings with its 60+ member organisations, articles on the website and communication on social media.
